definition: To provide evidence or proof of something, typically used in the context of demonstrating or verifying the validity, existence, or accuracy of a claim, statement, or fact.

examples.english: He was able to prove his innocence.

examples.german: Die Studie konnte keinen Zusammenhang nachweisen.
examples.english: The study could not demonstrate any correlation.

examples.german: Es ist schwierig, den genauen Ursprung des Virus nachzuweisen.
examples.english: It is difficult to trace the exact origin of the virus.

examples.german: Die Polizei konnte den TÃ¤ter anhand von DNA-Spuren nachweisen.
examples.english: The police were able to identify the perpetrator based on DNA evidence.

examples.german: Er konnte seine Behauptungen nicht nachweisen.
examples.english: He could not substantiate his claims.
